app_title: Svelte 5 CMS Markdown Viewer with Multi-language Support

no_content_description: Add some markdown files to the /content directory to get started.

markdown_description: Full markdown support with syntax highlighting
modern_ui_description: Built with Tailwind CSS and DaisyUI components
fast_performance_description: Pre-rendered content with hot reload in development
responsive_design_description: Optimized for all devices and screen sizes
developer_friendly_description: Clean code architecture with comprehensive documentation
